p: After evaluating the composition of G0, it was observed that after some time the sugar on the surface of the chewable tablets begins to crystallize, therefore glycerol was added to the composition. Glycerol and other polyols are used as additives to protect from sucrose crystallization [ 2, 17, 42, 43]. In this research 9.61% of glycerol was used, which not only protects from sugar crystallization, but also gives a sweet taste for the tablets [ 44]. Glycerol also protects chewable tablets from water loss and the mass of tablets does not change a lot when stored in an open package.
